price: Na hakika misikiti ni ya Mwenyezi Mungu, basi msimuabudu yeyote pamoja na Mwenyezi Mungu.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا
footnotes: Na imefunuliwa kwangu kwamba kwa hakika misikiti ni ya Mwenyezi Mungu peke yake. Basi msimuabudu yeyote pamoja na Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-masājida lillahi falā tadʿū maʿa al-lahi aḥadan
